reasoning: The Wiki article detail page renders completely empty with no content visible in the main content area. This is a genuine rendering failure where the Wiki module content is not loading, not a test misunderstanding or invalid test setup.
evidence_summary: Screenshot shows the Wiki Test page with only header/navigation, trial banner, and footer visible. The main content area where the wiki article and TOC should be displayed is completely blank - no article text, no Table of Contents container, no wiki module content whatsoever. This indicates the Wiki article detail view control is failing to render.
scenario_id: Evoq.Social.Wiki::Table of Contents::Verify TOC generation from headings
